page.title: 03MOSSHAYNE FARM,CLYST HONITON
page.content: Most farms in this area are dairy farms .We visited {Mosshayne Farm}and the farmer,Mr.Gent,took us for a walk around the farm.There is a herd of 80 Friesian cattle.Most of them are black and white but just one of them is brown and white.Each day they get an average of 30 litres of milk from each cow.The most used building on the farm is the milking parlour where they can milk twelve cows at the same time. In the winter the cattle are kept in the cow barn for shelter.Each cow sleeps in its own cubicle.Beside the cow barn are some sheds where the very young calves are kept.
